user_input: Daniel has 7 boxes, and each box contains 9 items. He plans to buy 3 additional boxes with 8 items in each. If the total number of items exceeds 75, he will give away 5 items. Otherwise, he will keep them all.
Sophie has 15 flowers and plans to buy 5 bouquets with 3 flowers in each. If the total number of flowers exceeds 30 after buying, she will donate 6 flowers. Otherwise, she will keep them all.
James has 10 coins and decides to buy 4 sets, each containing 5 coins. If his total exceeds 40 coins, he will give away 8 coins. Otherwise, he will keep them all.
